steps.name: *  Rekare The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
*  Rekare The api user sets "api/blog" path parameters.
*  Rekare The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response.
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the status code is 203.
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "failed".
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the "data.message" information in the response body is "No id".
